g.text: Can you fully block access for this persona?
Can you require phishing resistant MFA for this persona?
Can you require a compliant device for this persona?
Can you use a trusted location (IP allowlist)?
Can you require MFA for this persona?
Can you require a device ID for this persona?
Can you use a device Extension Attribute for this persona?
Can you require a specific (set of) device
Can the persona be blocked for certain applications?
Action required on the persona when elevated identity risk?
Can legacy authentication be blocked for the persona?
Can you block device Operating Systems for this persona?
Is the persona accessing from the
same country or set of countries?
